description: Deletes the specified Config rule and all of its evaluation results. Config sets the state of a rule to DELETING until the deletion is complete. You cannot update a rule while it is in this state. If you make a PutConfigRule or DeleteConfigRule request for the rule, you will receive a ResourceInUseException. You can check the state of a rule by using the DescribeConfigRules request.

parameters.name: ConfigRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the Config rule that you want to delete.
